## Map with Statue of Liberty Marker

Below is a map made using Leaflet:

```{r}
library (leaflet)
new_map <- leaflet () %>% addTiles()%>%addMarkers(lng = -74.0445, lat = 40.6892, popup = "The Statue of Liberty")
```
